ValidationRule.description: User cannot edit Win Declaration Plan Date after Win Declaration
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !ISNEW() && ISCHANGED( G5_Planned_Date__c ) && NOT(ISBLANK(G5_Approval_Date__c )) && ( ISPICKVAL(StageName , "Handover (Prepare for Delivery)") || ISPICKVAL(StageName , "Execute (Start Delivery)") || ISPICKVAL(StageName , "Completed") ) && $Profile.Name<> $Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name && $Profile.Name<> $Label.System_Admin_Profile && $Profile.Name<> $Label.Global_Process_Admin_Profile_Name && ( RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Direct_Record_Type' || RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Indirect_Record_Type' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Win Declaration Plan Date cannot be edited after Win Declaration.
